prompt.description: Text description of the desired image(s). Max 32000 chars (gpt-image-1), 1000 (dall-e-2), 4000 (dall-e-3).

model.description: Model to use: dall-e-2, dall-e-3, or gpt-image-1.

n.description: Number of images to generate (1-10). For dall-e-3, only n=1 is supported.

quality.description: Quality of the image (gpt-image-1: high, medium, low; dall-e-3: hd, standard; dall-e-2: standard).

response_format.description: Response format (url or b64_json). Not supported for gpt-image-1 (always b64_json).

style.description: Image style (dall-e-3 only): vivid or natural.

user.description: Unique identifier for the end-user to help monitor abuse.

background.description: Background transparency (gpt-image-1 only): transparent, opaque or auto.

moderation.description: Content moderation level (gpt-image-1 only): low or auto.

output_compression.description: Compression level (0-100) for webp/jpeg output (gpt-image-1 only).

output_format.description: Output format (gpt-image-1 only): png, jpeg, or webp.

url.description: URL of the generated image (valid for 60 minutes)

revised_prompt.description: Revised prompt used by the model

text_tokens.description: Number of text tokens in the input
